api_list.name: Consult city
api_list.description:
The request parameters include the following fields:

**City**: A string representing the name of the city.
**State**: A string representing the name of the state.

This will return the following information:

- **id_city**: The unique identifier for the city.
- **city**: The name of the city.
- **code_ibge**: The IBGE code for the city.
- **id_state**: The unique identifier for the state.
- **state**: The name of the state.
- **acronym_state**: The acronym of the state.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ea7-erp.p.rapidapi.com/city"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ea7-erp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ea7-erp.p.rapidapi.com/city"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ea7-erp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
